snippet: In Beirut, the band Al-Rahel Al-Kabir, or the Great Departed, has been performing a satirical hymn to the leader of ISIS to uproarious laughter.
lead_paragraph: In Beirut, the band Al-Rahel Al-Kabir, or the Great Departed, has been performing a satirical hymn to the leader of ISIS to uproarious laughter.
